net.floodlightcontroller.core.util

类 AppCookie

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.floodlightcontroller.core.util.AppCookie

  • public class AppCookie
extends java.lang.Object
    A static utility class to register flow cookiue AppIds and generating flow cookies for a particular App` An "app" is a module or piece of code that can install flows in a switch. E.g., Forwarding and StaticFlowPusher are apps. An App is identified by a 12 bit integer, the id. Furthermore, an App has a name. The id value must be unique but the same name can be registered for multiple numeric ids. TODO: should we enforce unique names This class is thread-safe. The 64 bit OpenFlow cookie field used in the following way
  • Bit 63 -- 52 (12 bit): the AppId
  • Bit 51 -- 0 (52 bit): user data FIXME: The class should be a singleton. The registration method should return an instance of class. This instance should then be used to generate flow cookies. Ideally, we would also represent a flow cookie as a class instance.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAppFieldMask

        public static org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.U64 getAppFieldMask()
        Returns a mask suitable for matching the app ID within a cookie.
        返回:
        a mask representing the bits used for the app ID in the cookie

      • getUserFieldMask

        public static org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.U64 getUserFieldMask()
        Returns a mask suitable for matching the user field within a cookie.
        返回:
        a mask representing the bits used for user data in the cookie

      • makeCookie

        public static org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.U64 makeCookie(long application,
                                                                  long user)
        Encapsulate an application ID and a user block of stuff into a cookie
        参数:
        application - An ID to identify the application
        user - Some application specific data
        返回:
        a cookie for use in OFFlowMod.setCookie()
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the application has not been registered

      • extractApp

        public static long extractApp(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.U64 cookie)
        Extract the application id from a flow cookie. Does not check whether the application id is registered. The app ID is defined by the getAppFieldMask() bits
        参数:
        cookie -
        返回:

        返回:

        A lame attempt to prevent duplicate application ID.
        参数:

        appName -
        抛出:
